item.description:
On Saturday, December 6th (this coming Saturday!) join us for One-Shot Game Day/ JiffyCon at Middlesex Community College in Lowell (no affiliation with the college, just using the space).

The focus is on trying out new role playing games- some popular and some independently published games, some run by the authors! Games planned include D&D 4e, Misspent Youth, Zombie Cinema, and Factions at War. Haven't played 4e yet? Now's your chance? Need something besides just D&D? Come on in!

There will also be a "Board Game Corner" with all of the favorites and unsung cool games. Heard about a certain game but never got the opportunity to try it out? That is the whole focus of this con!

There is an admission, but it's just to cover cost of food (lunch is included!). We'd consider bringing food as an equitable pay (talk to us first though).

Kids 8 and up are welcome! Planning on bringing some kid friendly games!

Registration starts at 9:00 and games start at 10:00 and go until 5-6.
All of the information can be found here:

http://brilliantgameo...

Myriad Games in Salem, NH is helping support this by providing fabulous door prizes!

It's sure to be a ton of fun. A great chance to de-stress between the holidays!

EDIT: Details for finding this! (There are still openings, come on in, you'll have fun!)

Registration begins at 9:00 and games start at 10:00. We'll have some munchies and coffee at 9:00 for the people who are right on time!

Parking: Don't park in the little lot in front of Middlesex Community College (Lowell Campus). On the street right there are meters- all free on the weekend. Or there is a parking lot across the canal, behind the college, but it's a pain to get to unless you've been there before. Across the street from the college is a grey brick federal building that has a lot in the back- you can park there too.

How to find us: Classes are held at the college on Saturday so we're not going to be alone! We'll hang up signs though pointing the way- we're in the lower cafeteria if you are the "asking directions type".

Can't wait to see everyone! Bring games to share- it'll be a blast!
item.how_to_find_us: Park across the street behind the post office looking building. Follow signs.
item.name: One-Shot Game Day/ JiffyCon
